summary: This module defines a collection of reusable UI component classes and helper utilities that build and render Metaflow cards. It includes components for text, markdown, tables, images, HTML, error displays, artifact listings, DAG visualizations, and task specifications, as well as base classes for assembling JSON payloads consumed by the Metaflow card frontend.
business_intent: Provide a flexible framework for developers to generate rich, interactive cards within the Metaflow UI, enabling clear visualization of workflow metadata, task details, logs, artifacts, and errors to improve debugging, monitoring, and reporting of data pipelines.
